review: It's easy to navigate. I really like having the remote.

review: It works,  than it doesn't work. Connects, than doesn't connect. For awhile i thought it was my internet, so i called and called over and over again and everything else worked for wifi, computer, phone, laptop.  But noo not my amazon fire stick! Shows i have full connection but won't connect. Wasted the money. Id rather spend more and recieve my tv all the time. Its annoying

review: This little gadget brings all of my favorite amazon tv up with the easy touch of a button.  Great purchase if you have a tv that is not "smart" like the one we had in the basement.

review: Awesome! This thing is great and very inexpensive.

review: Finally decided to try and glad I did. Easy to set up. No problems watching with my Internet so far. Good sound (can't figure how). Will be worth the cost even if I only watch several movies or TV shows and then just put it away. There seems to be enough free with Prime membership to choose from that will be no problem. I like how you can purchase or rent certain video rather than join the carriers of certain movies available. Having your music downloaded automatically is a bonus.
